name: Curse of the Laser Dimension
description:
Curse has been cursed to have the name Curse, had his torso stolen, and worst of all... been banished to the Laser Dimension.

Push blocks to get to the exit, but the blocks have lasers.
Controls: K,M,N,H,U,I for movement. Z to undo

(Enter, then any key, to skip level)

Looks like a first game because it is.

Undo system based on Steven Miller's puzzle games.

Hex mechanics use https://godotengine.org/asset-library/asset/406
If you want to use that, be aware that it's not made for pointy-topped hexes. I turned it on the side, but that means the Y sort thinks Y is in the wrong direction.
